00070 void joDot::_validate(bool for_real)
00071 {
00072         copy_info();
00073         input1().validate( for_real );
00074         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00075         Format temp = info_.format();
00076         width = temp.width();
00077         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00078 }

00080 void joDot::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00081 {

00083         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00084 }

00086 void joDot::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00087 {
00089         out.range( 0, width );
00091         Row in1(x, r);
00092         Row in2(x, r);
00093 
00094         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00095         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00097         foreach (z, channels) 
00098         {
00100                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00101                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00102                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00104                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00105                 {
00107                         Vector one( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00108                         Vector two( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index]);
00110                         if ( one.length() > 0.0001 && two.length() > 0.0001 )
00111                         {
00113                                 float result = one.dot( two );
00115                                 outPixelsR[index] = result;
00116                                 outPixelsG[index] = result;
00117                                 outPixelsB[index] = result;
00118 
00119                         } 
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00123                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00124                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00125                         }
00126 
00127 
00128                         
00129                 }
00130                 
00131         }
00132 }
